Description: Textile fragment; corner of thick undyed linen cloth; medium to coarse quality; looped warp fringe with the loops twisted back on themselves; selvedge apparently plain, but the outer thread of a thicker, harder fibre than the linen, is also darker. This thread knotted just above the beginning of the fringe and a loop and a loose end extend beyond. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are Z-spun; the stitch gauge is warp c.24 ends per 10mm and weft 8 picks per 10mm.
